At least some of these devices have the incorrect FCC ID printed on the label - QS4-611AL. Identifies in Windows as a.. *'''PCMCIA\11WAVE-11WP611AL-E-F4E9''' *'''PCMCIA\11WAVE-11WP611AL-E-0000-0000''' Identifies in Linux (via pccardctl ident) as.. 
Socket 0:
  product info: "11WAVE
", "11WP611AL-E
", "", ""
  manfid: 0x0000, 0x0000
  function: 6 (network)
Per the box, the output power of the devices is 14dBm +- 2dBm. This device is also referred to as PWC-351 in the FCC docs. [[Category:English Documentation]]
